mapper.insert: INSERT INTO companymember(id, address, corporate_registration_number) VALUES(#{id}, #{address}, #{corporateRegistrationNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT companymember.id, member.name, member.nickname, companymember.corporate_registration_number, member.tel FROM member member,companymember companymember, authorities authorities WHERE member.id=companymember.id and companymember.id=authorities.id and authorities.authority='ROLE_COMPANY_NON_VERIFIED'

SELECT companymember.id, member.name, member.nickname, companymember.corporate_registration_number, member.tel FROM member member,companymember companymember, authorities authorities WHERE member.id=companymember.id and companymember.id=authorities.id and authorities.authority='ROLE_COMPANY_VERIFIED'
mapper.update: update companymember set address = #{address},corporate_registration_number = #{corporateRegistrationNumber} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select member.id, member.name, member.nickname, member.tel, companymember.address, companymember.corporate_registration_number as corporateRegistrationNumber , companymember.approval, companymember.write from member member, companymember companymember where member.id=companymember.id and member.enabled=1
select authority from authorities where id=#{value}
select write from companymember where id=#{value}
